salixRadiusMIB.name: salixRadiusMIB
salixRadiusMIB.contactinfo: 904 Wind River Lane Suite 101 Gaithersburg, MD 20878 (301)-417-0017
salixRadiusMIB.description: This MIB describes objects relating to RADIUS protocol support in SALIX products that is not described in RFC 2618.

salixRadiusServerConfigTable.name: salixRadiusServerConfigTable
salixRadiusServerConfigTable.description: The RADIUS server configuration table. This table provides a mechanism for configuring RADIUS servers.

salixRadiusServerConfigEntry.name: salixRadiusServerConfigEntry
salixRadiusServerConfigEntry.description: An entry in the salixRadiusServerConfigTable that identifies the parameters necessary to download announcements to the system.

salixRadiusServerIndex.name: salixRadiusServerIndex
salixRadiusServerIndex.description: The unique index for the RADIUS server. Servers are queried in order. E.g. the server at index 1 is tried first and if it times out, the server at index 2 tried.

salixRadiusServerIpAddress.name: salixRadiusServerIpAddress
salixRadiusServerIpAddress.description: The IP address of the RADIUS server.

salixRadiusServerUdpPort.name: salixRadiusServerUdpPort
salixRadiusServerUdpPort.description: The UDP port number that the RADIUS server listens on for Access-Requests.

salixRadiusServerSharedSecret.name: salixRadiusServerSharedSecret
salixRadiusServerSharedSecret.description: The shared secret that will be used when communicating with this server. For security reasons, reading this field will return an empty string.

salixRadiusServerEnabled.name: salixRadiusServerEnabled
salixRadiusServerEnabled.description: This value indicates whether requests should be sent to this server.

salixUserAuthenticationMethod.name: salixUserAuthenticationMethod
salixUserAuthenticationMethod.description: The user authentication method for all logins into the system. The following choices are available: internal(0) - The system stores the username/password pairs in its nonvolatile memory. radius(1) - Authenticate using the RADIUS protocol. tacacs(2) - Authenticate using TACACS protocol. xtacacs(3) - Authenticate using the XTACACS protocol. tacacsplus(4) - Authenticate using the TACACS+ protocol.

salixRadiusAccessRequestTimeout.name: salixRadiusAccessRequestTimeout
salixRadiusAccessRequestTimeout.description: Indicates that an Access Request to the specified server has timed out. The default alarm severity for this alarm is 'minor'.

salixRadiusAccessDenied.name: salixRadiusAccessDenied
salixRadiusAccessDenied.description: Indicates that a login attempt was denied by the specified server. This could be due to someone trying to gain unauthorized access or due to a misconfiguration of the server. The default alarm severity for this alarm is 'minor'.

salixRadiusCompliance.name: salixRadiusCompliance
salixRadiusCompliance.description: The basic implementation requirements for the SALIX-RADIUS-MIB.
